channel.title: Fact-gems
channel.description:
Some bits of knowledge are worth sharing. Those moments rare, but they do happen occasionally. (Feel free to bump when some interesting knowledge hits you.) [quote] In Switzerland, the heraldic bears in a coat of arms had to be painted with bright red penises, or would be mocked as being she-bears. The omission of this led to a war in 1579 between St. Gallen and the canton of Appenzell. [/quote] [url]https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bears_in_heraldry[/url]
Yes, we've gone to war over the drawing of penises. You can set your faith in humanity down now if you haven't already.

item.title: Fact-gems
item.dc:creator: uk_sniper
item.description:
the largest man made explosion is the Tsar Bomba with a estimated explosion of 50megatonnes. This was scaled back from the inital aim of 100 megatonnes. the Explosion created an earthquake that could be felt on its third passage around the earth and despite the size of the explosion and the amount of material used it is still the cleanest nuclear explosion on record.

fact.

also penis-fact: the penis of the pig is a corkscrew in shape!

Read full topic

item.title: Fact-gems
item.dc:creator: Bolteh
item.description:
The penis of a male cat has hooks to ensure success once he mounted the female cat. Additionally, once he pulls out, the hooks damage the vagina so the female cat is in constant pain down there, and thus doesn’t want to sex with any other male cat anymore, since felmale cats can get pregnant from different males at the same time.

When it’s “cat season”, the screams and cries you hear in the streets, are from female cats being raped by males.

So stop throwing shoes at them when they’re keeping you awake :hmph:

Read full topic

item.title: Fact-gems
item.dc:creator: Fnoigy
item.description:
Argentine ants, when agitated, are spicy on the lips, and unpleasant in the lungs.

EDIT: It seems asian needle ant queens may not actually have an aggregation pheromone.

item.title: Fact-gems
item.dc:creator: Comrade_Tiki
item.description:
Here’s a gem, a lesson for what you get when you complain:

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Walther_von_Reichenau:

On 19 December 1941 Hitler sacked Walther von Brauchitsch as Commander-in-Chief and tried to appoint von Reichenau to the post. But again the senior Army leaders rejected von Reichenau as being “too political” and Hitler appointed himself instead.

Read full topic
